explains: adj. 相似的，类似的；（器官）同功的

sentences.en: Leibniz developed closely analogous concepts and techniques.
sentences.cn: 莱布尼茨发展了类似的概念和技术。

sentences.en: The solar system also has two analogous classes of objects, smaller than planets—namely, asteroids and comets.
sentences.cn: 太阳系也有两类类似的物体，比行星还小——即小行星和彗星。

sentences.en: For example, a gap just below aluminum suggested a new element would be found with properties analogous to those of aluminum.
sentences.cn: 例如，就在铝下面有一个空位，这表明还有一个性质和铝类似的新元素存在。
